# Change Log

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.
See [Conventional Commits](https://conventionalcommits.org) for commit guidelines.

# [3.0.0](https://github.com/material-components/material-components-web/compare/v2.3.1...v3.0.0) (2019-06-25)


### Bug Fixes

* **dialog:** Add noflip annotations for GSS compiler. ([#4769](https://github.com/material-components/material-components-web/issues/4769)) ([d644e78](https://github.com/material-components/material-components-web/commit/d644e78))
* **dialog:** Fix scrolling content overflowing on Chrome/Android. ([#4746](https://github.com/material-components/material-components-web/issues/4746)) ([f741ae0](https://github.com/material-components/material-components-web/commit/f741ae0))
* **dialog:** Use 100vw for dialog max-width calculation. ([#4766](https://github.com/material-components/material-components-web/issues/4766)) ([f918e0a](https://github.com/material-components/material-components-web/commit/f918e0a)), closes [#4746](https://github.com/material-components/material-components-web/issues/4746)


### Code Refactoring

* **dialog:** Split dialog Foundation#handleInteraction into #handleClick/#handleKeydown. ([#4655](https://github.com/material-components/material-components-web/issues/4655)) ([36d516a](https://github.com/material-components/material-components-web/commit/36d516a))


### Features

* **dialog:** Add Adapter#getInitialFocusEl. ([#4719](https://github.com/material-components/material-components-web/issues/4719)) ([1108307](https://github.com/material-components/material-components-web/commit/1108307))


### BREAKING CHANGES

* **dialog:** Dialog Adapter#getInitialFocusEl has been added and Adapter#trapFocus first argument is now the initialFocusEl.
* **dialog:** Dialog `Foundation#handleInteraction` has been split into two methods: `#handleClick` and `#handleKeydown`.
